articles.summary: The Hollywood Reporter homepage Inside the Revolt of the Golden Globes’ “Legacy Voters” The remaining holdovers from the Hollywood Foreign Press Association that sold itself in 2023, unhappy about the recent termination of their pay and other perceived slights, have reconstituted the HFPA and sought the intervention of California's attorney general — do they have a leg to stand on?
